page.title: 14My life in Cheshunt
page.content: My house in Cheshunt is spacious and modern.It has a small kitchen and a large living room. My family are rather close on my dad's side,but I've hardly seen any family on my mum's side because they all live in Wales.I am one sixteenth welsh. I get up at about seven o'clock on weekdays but about nine or ten on weekends.On weekdays I go to Turnford School.It is rather good.On Saturday I go down to Waltham Cross and on Sundays I see my dad.My dad doesn't have any pets but we have a black cat called Sooty and he is seven years old. In the evenings I normally watch the television to relax after school but sometimes I play out with my friends.
